summary_comment: Professor Mu is considered a very good teacher in terms of academic content, but she is noted for being extremely rude and impatient, often dismissing students' questions as if they are unintelligent. Despite her teaching quality, her demeanor makes the class a challenging environment.
summary_comment_short: Professor Mu is known for being a very good teacher who can help students boost their GPA easily. However, she is described as extremely rude and impatient, often dismissing students' questions harshly.

Ratings.comment: This is an easy A class if you want to boost your GPA. However, Bing Mu is the rudest person I have ever met in this campus. Ask her a question and she will retreat you as an idiot. Rude, impatient.
